payload.text: ÛŒÚ© Ù‚Ø§Ù„Ø¨ Ø³Ø§ÛŒØª Ø¯Ù‚ÛŒÙ‚ Ù…Ø«Ù„ Ø³Ø§ÛŒØª ÙÛŒÙ„ÛŒÙ…Ùˆ Ø¨Ø³Ø§Ø² Ø¨Ø§ Ø¬Ø²Ø¦ÛŒØ§Øª

**Defining the React Replica**

I'm now fully immersed in the Filimo website template replica project. I'm focusing on React, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript for the frontend, ensuring the user interface is pixel-perfect and responsive. I'm setting up the foundation to integrate Gemini API for AI-powered features, aiming for robust and scalable implementations.


**Outlining the UI Structure**

I'm currently delineating the key UI components and file structure for the Filimo replica. I've designed the hero section banner, the sticky navigation, the rows of content and movie cards, and filters. Now, I'm setting up metadata, HTML, and TypeScript entry points with the intention to establish a robust foundation. I'm focusing on the dark theme visuals with brand color accents.

entries.description: Project metadata with name and description of the Filimo-style VOD application.
Main HTML file with Tailwind CSS and Vazirmatn font for Persian typography.
Application entry point using React 18 createRoot.
Global TypeScript interfaces for movie data and application state.

entries.description: Service for AI movie recommendations and smart search.
A sticky navigation bar with search and user actions.
Cinematic hero section with a backdrop and movie details.
Movie poster card with hover effects and rating.
A horizontal scrolling row of movie cards.
Interactive section powered by Gemini API for personalized recommendations.
Comprehensive footer with site information and links.
